attributes.action: exclude the Dartford Crossing from the proposed asset sale.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have been campaigning for many months to have the Dartford Crossing revert to a free service, as promised by Government once it had recouped its construction costs. If it is sold to private enterprise that will confirm its long-term status as a paid for service. Whilst I vehemently disagree in principal with your Thatcheresque asset stripping, the inclusion of the Dartford Crossing is particularly unpalatable and it should be excluded as not being in the public interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
